name: Brick Brick
description:
Controls:

- Left and RIght arrows move the paddle

- press SPACE or ENTER to throw the ball

- Press ESCAPE to go to the main menu

Arcade:

Destroy as many bricks as you can. You have 3 extra lives, the level restart when you win - lives do not reset. Destroy as many bricks as you can without losing, get a higher score.

Levels:

Three extra lives per level. There are 45 levels to play. Try beating them all.
